Boss of [Me]0-i

By [Tia Louise]140-tia louise

[They]375-they warned [me]0-i not to take this job . [They]375-they said [you]360-you were ruthless , impossible to please … [I]0-i said [I]0-i was better than [them]375-they . [I]0-i would n’t fall for [your]360-you charm , [your]360-you arrogance , or how sexy [you]360-you fill out that suit . [I]0-i would n’t fall for [your]360-you deep brown eyes or the way that muscle moves in [your]360-you square jaw when [you]360-you ’re pissed .

[I]0-i said [I]0-i could resist [you]360-you . [I]0-i was wrong ...

( [BOSS OF [ME]0-i]376-boss of me is [a STAND - ALONE workplace]377-a stand - alone workplace , military romance with [a badass alpha boss]378-a badass alpha boss and [the feisty woman who steals and heals [his]378-a badass alpha boss heart]379-the feisty woman who steals and heals his heart . No cheating . No cliffhangers . )

“ [I]0-i ’ll never leave [you]360-you behind , never forget . ”[0-i] -George S. [Fletcher II

Prologue

Patton]166-fletcher ii prologue patton

Seven years ago in [a jungle south of the border]380-a jungle south of the border …

The clock is ticking . [We]381-we have to move fast or this will go terribly wrong . Sweat rolls down [my]0-i sides , and [I]0-i exhale slowly , calming [my]0-i pulse . The air around [us]381-we is heavy and close , so thick it ’s almost visible and so hot it ’s almost impossible to breathe . Tropical plants form a dense barrier of wide , shiny leaves around [us]381-we , and [we]381-we ’re hidden in the brush around [a small , cinder - block hut]382-a small , cinder - block hut . [Our]381-we target is a green dot on [my]0-i screen blinking right in front of [us]381-we . [He]378-a badass alpha boss ’s here . “ Moving in , eleven o’clock . ”[218-taron] [Taron]218-taron ’s voice is low in [my]0-i ear . “ Coming up from [the southeast]2194-the southeast . ”[218-taron] [Sawyer]168-sawyer ’s distinct southern drawl is a quick response . “ No noise . [No prisoners]2195-no prisoners . ”[168-sawyer] [I]0-i give the order , firm and clear . [I]0-i ’m [the leader of this three - man rescue mission]383-the leader of this three - man rescue mission , and [we]381-we wo n’t fail . [We]381-we surround [the unpainted , cinder - block hovel]384-the unpainted , cinder - block hovel . [It]385-it ’s quiet in the shadows . The windows are black holes with no glass , empty squares that could be hiding anything — [watchers with guns]386-watchers with guns , lining [us]381-we up in the crosshairs . Or [he]378-a badass alpha boss could be alone . No , it would never be that easy . [He]378-a badass alpha boss could be dead . [My]0-i jaw tightens and [I]0-i push back on the thought . What good would [he]378-a badass alpha boss be to [them]387-they dead ? Taking a knee , [I]0-i slowly lift [my]0-i gun to [my]0-i eye , setting [my]0-i sites on the front door . [We]381-we ’ve been tracking radio signals , emails and IP addresses , until [we]381-we isolated [them]387-they [here]388-here . Two weeks have passed since [Martin]160-martin was jumped on a routine fuel run . From what [we]381-we ’ve been able to piece together , [they]387-they took [him]160-martin down with PAVA spray , a paralyzing nerve gas . Then the videos started . Two weeks of grainy images of [[our]381-we friend]389-our friend and [fellow Marine]390-fellow marine tied to a chair with a bag over [his]160-martin head . [They]387-they ’d rip it off to reveal black eyes and bloodstained skin . Then the threats started — guns and money . It ’s what [they]387-they all want . Until now , the moment of truth in the heart of [a South American jungle]391-a south american jungle . [We]381-we ’re tired , thirsty , and focused on retrieving [[our]381-we friend]389-our friend , kidnapped off - duty in a routine stop on [our]381-we way to [a peace - keeping mission in [Caracas]3-caracas]393-a peace - keeping mission in caracas . [Sawyer]168-sawyer checks in from [his]394-his point , and [we]381-we watch as [Taron]218-taron creeps across the face of [the structure]395-the structure , approaching the weathered wooden door . [His]218-taron gun is at [his]218-taron chest as [he]218-taron carefully reaches out and knocks . Three sharp raps , and [we]381-we wait . [Nobody]396-nobody breathes . No response . [He]218-taron looks to [me]0-i , and [I]0-i give a nod . [I]0-i ’m front and center , ready to cover [him]218-taron . [Nobody]396-nobody gets past [me]0-i . [Nobody]396-nobody takes [[my]0-i men]399-my men . [We]381-we ’re [brothers]400-brothers — [no one forgotten]401-no one forgotten , [no one left behind]402-no one left behind . [My]0-i heart beats like a mallet against [my]0-i ribs . As much as [we]381-we ’ve trained , this scene is entirely unpredictable . [We]381-we hope to have the element of surprise . [We]381-we hope [[his]218-taron kidnappers]403-his kidnappers believe [we]381-we ’re still in [Los Cabos]4-los cabos , but [they]403-his kidnappers could be smarter than [we]381-we give [them]403-his kidnappers credit for . With low growl , [I]0-i shake [my]0-i head . Not likely . [These drugged - up gangsters]404-these drugged - up gangsters dared to kidnap [a Marine]405-a marine . The only thing stopping [us]381-we from torching [this whole place]406-this whole place is [my]0-i belief [we]381-we can extract [him]218-taron without causing unnecessary casualties . [Taron]218-taron ’s jaw is set , the sleeves of [his]218-taron tan shirt showing from beneath the black Kevlar vest are stained with sweat , and [his]218-taron light - brown hair is wet . All [our]381-we faces are scrubbed with camouflage , making the whites of [our]381-we eyes seem to glow . [My]0-i breath stills . [My]0-i cheek is pressed to [my]0-i gun barrel , and the noise of cicadas rises like a chorus around [us]381-we . It grows louder , a warning . [I]0-i shake off the thought . [Taron]218-taron is [my]0-i focus . The shadow of [Sawyer]168-sawyer emerges from the brush at [the opposite end of [the house]408-the house]407-the opposite end of the house . [They]409-they ’re acting on [my]0-i orders , but [we]381-we ’re [brothers]400-brothers . [We]381-we ’ve had [each other]411-each other ’s backs since [Day One]169-day one . This is more than a rescue . [Martin]160-martin is [family]412-family . [Taron]218-taron moves away from the concrete wall , and [my]0-i finger is ready on the trigger . The only thing standing between [us]381-we and what ’s about to happen is a wooden door … [He]218-taron lifts [his]218-taron leg and gives the door a sharp kick , sending it flying against the wall with a blast that rattles [the quiet jungle]413-the quiet jungle . [His]218-taron back is against the wall again , and [he]218-taron holds , waiting for a barrage of bullets . None come . Three heartbeats , three silent breaths — [I]0-i give [him]218-taron a nod . [He]218-taron turns quickly , gun at eye level and steps through the space , swinging [his]218-taron weapon side to side . [Sawyer]168-sawyer is at [his]218-taron side , and [I]0-i ’m out of position moving forward to cover [them]414-them . “ [Marley]170-marley ! ”[168-sawyer] [Taron]218-taron ’s gun lowers , and [he]218-taron rushes forward . [I]0-i ’m at the door to see [him]218-taron whip the bag off [[our]381-we friend]389-our friend ’s face , and it hits [me]0-i like a sucker punch . [His]218-taron head drops forward , bobbing like a top . [I]0-i do n’t understand [his]218-taron mumbles . A thick stream of bloody spit drips from [his]218-taron swollen lips . Rage mixes with adrenaline . [He]218-taron ’s been beaten almost to death , and cords of rope cut into [his]218-taron skin . [Taron]218-taron ’s quickly slicing [his]218-taron restraints as [Sawyer]168-sawyer and [I]0-i case [the hut]416-the hut . [It]416-the hut appears deserted , which puts [me]0-i on guard for [IEDs]171-ieds . [The unfurnished room]417-the unfurnished room has no interior light , casting long shadows in the corners . With a muted thud , [Marley]170-marley ’s knees hit the floor . [Taron]218-taron bends to help lift [him]218-taron , and that ’s when [I]0-i see [her]168-sawyer . Green eyes shining like cat in the darkness . “ No ! ”[0-i] [I]0-i shout as [she]168-sawyer rushes forward , screaming , just in time for [Taron]218-taron to whip around and see the raised machete in [her]168-sawyer hand . Light flashes off the silver blade , the blast of [Taron]218-taron ’s pistol deafens [us]418-us in [the small space]419-the small space , and [she]168-sawyer drops like a stone , a bloody splatter like a megaphone fanning out on the floor in front of [her]168-sawyer small body . Long , caramel hair fans around [her]168-sawyer head , and [she]168-sawyer looks seventeen . “ God , no . ”[218-taron] [He]218-taron lets out a pained groan as the small gun falls to the floor . For a moment , [we]418-us ’re unable to move , unable to look away from [the girl lying dead at [our]418-us feet]420-the girl lying dead at our feet . [My]0-i eyes heat , but [I]0-i squeeze them shut briefly , clenching [my]0-i teeth against the emotion . [Marley]170-marley mumbles incoherent words . [He]218-taron ’s barely conscious , beaten almost beyond recognition . [I]0-i ca n’t even tell if [he]218-taron recognizes [us]418-us . The machete is at [his]218-taron feet , beside [the dead girl]421-the dead girl . [She]421-the dead girl would have slashed [them]422-them both if [Taron]218-taron had n’t done what [he]218-taron did . Combat leaves no room for second - guessing . [Hesitation]172-hesitation is how [you]423-you end up dead , cut in half by [a teenager [you]423-you ’d otherwise overlook]424-a teenager you ’d otherwise overlook . [A girl who never should have been here]425-a girl who never should have been here . [[Bastards]426-bastards using [children]428-children to fight [their]428-children battles]427-bastards using children to fight their battles . “ Get [him]218-taron out of here . ”[0-i] [My]0-i voice is a gruff order . When [Taron]218-taron does n’t move , [I]0-i raise the volume . “ [I]218-taron said GO ! ”[218-taron] [He]218-taron struggles to lift [Marley]170-marley over [his]218-taron shoulder , and [Sawyer]168-sawyer steps forward to help [him]218-taron . [I]0-i ’m [the last one]429-the last one to leave [the hut]416-the hut , giving [it]416-the hut a final sweep before [I]0-i turn , in time to see [Taron]218-taron hit the ground and then cry out in pain . “ [Mother]2196-mother — ”[218-taron] [He]218-taron rolls to [his]218-taron side , blood soaking [his]218-taron lower back from where [he]218-taron landed on a broken sapling . “ [Patton]166-fletcher ii prologue patton , stop ! ”[168-sawyer] [Sawyer]168-sawyer yells , and [I]0-i see the trip wire . How [we]431-we missed it coming in is [anybody]359-anybody ’s guess . [Sawyer]168-sawyer hoists [Marley]170-marley onto [his]218-taron shoulders . [He]218-taron ’s strong as an ox from working on [[his]218-taron family ’s peach farm back [home]434-home]433-his family ’s peach farm back home . [I]0-i throw [my]0-i rifle over [my]0-i shoulder and lean down , grabbing [Taron]218-taron ’s arm . “ Can [you]218-taron walk ? ”[0-i] [His]218-taron face is scrunched in agony , but [he]218-taron manages to nod . “ Get [us]431-we out of here . ”[0-i] [My]0-i jaw is tight , [my]0-i brow set , and [I]0-i force the determination [we]431-we need to finish this rescue mission . [Our]431-we ATV is down [the hill]435-the hill , hidden in the brush , and [we]431-we follow [Sawyer]168-sawyer , [Taron]218-taron leaning heavily on [me]0-i . This injury might send [him]218-taron [home]434-home , and [Marley]170-marley ’s worse . [We]431-we ’re all worse on the inside . [We]431-we saved [[our]431-we man]437-our man , but [we]431-we ’re all scarred by what [we]431-we left behind . It ’s too late to change it . [We]431-we ’ll deal with the scars later . When the fighting stops .

1

[Raquel]173-raquel

Present day

A hot breeze whips through [the streets of downtown [Nashville]5-nashville]438-the streets of downtown nashville , sweeping [my]0-i light brown hair off [my]0-i shoulders and throwing [my]0-i black blazer open . [I]0-i catch it , holding [my]0-i bag and clutching [my]0-i phone to [my]0-i ear , hanging on [[my]0-i sister]439-my sister [Renée]174-renée ’s words like the voice of [God]175-god . “ Make friends with [Sandra]227-sandra . [She]227-sandra ’s [a good ally]2197-a good ally . ”[175-god] [Renée]174-renée is encouraging , but [my]0-i stomach is in knots . “ Do n’t ask too many questions . About the Author

[Tia Louise]140-tia louise is [the USA TODAY bestselling , award - winning author of super hot and sexy romance]2177-the usa today bestselling , award - winning author of super hot and sexy romance . Whether [billionaires]2178-billionaires , [Marines]2789-marines , [fighters]2180-fighters , [cowboys]2181-cowboys , [single dads]2182-single dads , or [CEOs]2183-ceos , [all [her]140-tia louise heroes]2184-all her heroes are [alphas with hearts of gold]2185-alphas with hearts of gold . [All [her]140-tia louise heroines]2186-all her heroines are [the strong , sassy ladies]2187-the strong , sassy ladies , and ALL [her]140-tia louise endings are happily ever after . [A former teacher]2188-a former teacher , [journalist]2189-journalist , and [book editor]2190-book editor , [Louise]140-tia louise lives in [the Midwest USA]2191-the midwest usa with [[her]140-tia louise trophy husband]2192-her trophy husband and [two teenage geniuses]2193-two teenage geniuses .
